data.title: Great Family Dinner
data.text: Plentiful portions of yummy Mexican favorites.  Family friendly setting.  Reasonably priced meals we always end up sampling each other's.

data.title: Not up to par.
data.text:
We have been going to this restaurant for twenty five years and our last visit was disappointing. The food was  not up to standard and the waitress would not allow my wife who has a very small appetite to order from the children menu, (she did not want to waste food.)
I hope this was an off night, as they used to be outstanding.

data.title: casita mejicana
data.text: casita tejas has very good mexican food and there queso fundido is delicious also there quesadillas and tamales are great , they also have beer and wine.

data.title: Authentically Delicious Mexican Food
data.text: Everything I've eaten here has been "authentically delicious"!  My family and I come here during the Fall season when festivals are in bloom, on our way to/from Everglades National Park or antique store shopping, we've even catered parties using them.  Great place to eat delicious food and centrally located in the historic downtown area.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Food was awesome. Waitresses worked very hard, but they didn't have enough help. Never got a refill on drinks. Not sure if this was the norm, but they need more then 2 waitresses working here.

data.title: Tastless food that is thin on content
data.text:
My wife and I love Mexican Food and have sampled varieties from all across the country.  This location served us very bland tasting food with skimpy portions of meat where it counts.  
The location is easy to access with on-site parking.  The interior is nice and roomy.  The service is great... but I go to a restaurant for the food and this one fell way short of most Mexican fare we have tried.

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: My husband and I have been here several times and it never disappoints. This is a true Tex-Mex restaurant! Their beans are delicious, guac is aways great, and we highly recommend the Burrito Norteño. Give it a try!

data.title: Nice Clean Tex/Mex Restaurant
data.text: Very clean and rustic feel to this restaurant. Ample free parking and friendly staff. It is a good Tex/Mex restaurant with very delicious alternatives. High Recommend.

data.title: Delicious Mexican food, good price
data.text: For authentic Mexican food this is a great place to eat. Simple but clean place, good portion and good prices

data.title: Must Stand Out for Locals
data.text: There is nothing to stop anyone from visiting this location to taste their menu.  We have traveled so much that our comparisons lay with other similar restaurants and this restaurant was average.  Not a bad thing but we have had better. The facility has easy access, and wide open seating on the interior.  The staff was attentive and accommodating to the peculiar tastes of an 8-year old.  The plates were well presented and well portioned.  However, the flavor is what should keep you coming back. In this instance, on this day, at this time... the flavors were flat.  There was no distinction in the ingredients and it made the entirety of the plate seem like one item.

data.title: TERRIBLE PLACE AND A HAIR ON MY MEAL!
data.text:
We recently had lunch at this place after my wife and I rode to Homestead. We always eat at LA QUEBRADITA which is much better but my wife wanted to try something different. Service was super slow, the guacamole had a bitter taste. 
We ordered some enchiladas and I noticed a hair on my beans right after I ate! That was disgusting and when I told the waitress she simply ignored what I said... 
I ended paying the whole lunch including the hair...

data.title: Greatness
data.text: Friendly servers who spoke fluent English and helped with recommendations. Large portions, fresh, hot and delicious. Munched on fresh salsa and warm chips while we waited a short time on the entrées.

data.title: Fist time!!
data.text: Very good!!! The atención espectscular!!!! I recommend!!!! Oscar is the best!!!! 🤗🤗thanks for your service!!

data.title: Go to spot
data.text: When I need my Mexican food fix... This is where I go! Service is good and quick. Food has plenty of flavor. And if you haven't tried the Mole enchiladas, you don't know what you're missing, for real!

data.title: Cold, no flavor, Noisy
data.text: Had the shrimp with garlic. Cold and dry. The tomatoes were tainted on all the dishes. Chicken enchiladas cold and dry. Red sauce tasted canned and verde sauce was bland. Waitress was very sweet. Won't be back.

data.title: Gringo food
data.text:
Do not understand why this place received 5 stars...the food was horrible.  The place from I saw only Americans eat there..and they must be starving leaving Key West. We ordered two traditional mexican meals and both were horrible. ..couldn't even finish them. This is mexican food for white people That don't know real mexican food...if you want  real traditional  mexican food in Homestead go up the road to one of the makeshift huts on the side of the road or one of the gas stations that have a kitchen in it.
I'm not trying to sound so mean but it just wasn't good food at all....

data.title: Enjoyed our dinner!!!
data.text: We really enjoyed our dinner. My beef burrito was delicious. The menu has a wide selection of Mexican dishes! Clean restaurant! Great Service! Great prices!!!

data.title: Delicious Mexican food
data.text: We were on the search for a good Mexican place on our way to Miami. Asked a local and they recommended this to us. Great Mexican food and great service! We really enjoyed it. Only downfall is their salsa is extremely chunky with onions and tomatoes and cilantro. I'm sure some would like that more than others, but us not too much. Wish they had some sort of cheese dip as an alternative. Nonetheless, it was great food.

data.title: Great food and service
data.text:
Stopped there on a Saturday afternoon for some lunch. Food was really great. We had both the Fiesta platter and the Guadalajara platter. Too much food for 2 adults and 2 kids! We ended up eating just the Guadalajara platter and got the other one to go. Super yummy food and we got a taste of most items on the menu! The beans and the rice are delicious, our kids couldn't stop eating them. 
Definitely recommended! 
The place is usually quite busy. Food tasted fresh and savory.

data.title: Fantastic!!
data.text: Was searching for a good place for dinner and after reading all the reviews on TA decided to try this place out!!  It was amazing from the second we stepped in the door.  Right away we were greeted and sat by the guy at the register.  He was very friendly and took our drink order and told us he would let our server know.  When our server brought our drinks over she was very friendly as well.  Throughout the whole meal the service was wonderful!  The salsa was very good had just the right spice!  I ordered the shrimp tacos and my boyfriend had the tamales they were both amazing.  Portions were good we both ended up taking food home.  Prices were also good.  I will definitely be back.  Just moved to Homestead so I have been trying many different places, but not many have the friendly service, great food, and good price all in one place!  We did not have any alcohol this time so not sure how the price is on that, but they did offer beer, wine, and margaritas!!  Thanks for the great service that seems hard to find down here!!  Can't wait to go back!
